name: css-flex-shrink
description: Css module of single purpose classes for flex shrink

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-flex-shrink.css > css/css-flex-shrink.css && tachyons src/css-flex-shrink.css --minify > css/css-flex-shrink.min.css && tachyons src/css-flex-shrink.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
